name: iLE New Super Package
meta_description: The iLE is designed to provide pressure relief and support for pain-free sleep. Explore more about this innovation series mattress on our site.

bottom.name: FAQ - Do I need a base?

data.question: Do I need a base?
data.answer: A Sleep Number bed requires a firm flat surface to evenly support the air chambers inside your bed. A traditional box spring does not provide the support required for a Sleep Number mattress. The firm solid surface offered by our Integrated Base, our FlexFit™ Smart Adjustable Bases or a platform bed is the ideal surface for your Sleep Number mattress.  Note: Smart Adjustable bases are not available for Twin XL size mattress.

bottom.name: FAQ - Will a Sleep Number mattress fit with my existing furniture?

data.question: Will a Sleep Number mattress fit with my existing furniture?
data.answer:
Sleep Number mattresses come in all standard industry mattress sizes and will fit into traditional frames and furniture sets. FlexFit™ Smart Adjustable Bases can stand-alone or be placed inside of your freestanding bed frame.Industry standard sizes include:

  • Twin: 38"inches x 75"inches
  • Twin XL: 38"inches x 80"inches
  • Full/Double: 54"inches x 75"inches
  • Queen: 60"inches x 80"inches
  • King: 76"inches x 80"inches
  • California King: 72"inches x 84"

bottom.name: FAQ - How do I control the bed?

data.question: How do I control the bed?
data.answer: A Sleep Number bed is controlled through the use of the remote feature in the SleepIQ app. Using the app, you can find or adjust your Sleep Number setting, adjust the position of your FlexFit™ Smart Adjustable Base and control your accessories, including under-bed lighting and foot warming.

bottom.name: FAQ - What is the difference between a FlexTop King and Split King mattress?

data.question: What is the difference between a FlexTop King and Split King mattress?
data.answer: Our exclusive FlexTop King or FlexTop California King size mattresses will have a split just at the head so you can raise and lower the head of your bed separately, but the foot of your bed will move as one. Our Split King or Split California King size mattresses will have a split down the full center so you can raise and lower the head and foot of your bed separately on each side.

bottom.name: FAQ - Can I try the beds before I buy?

data.question: Can I try the beds before I buy?
data.answer:
Yes! We have over 670 Sleep Number stores, and you will only find a Sleep Number bed in one of our stores. Unlike other manufacturers, we do not sell our beds through other mattress retailers. One of our sleep professionals would be happy to help you find your Sleep Number setting and help you find the bed model that’s best for you.
Visit our store locator to find a store closest to you.

bottom.name: FAQ - Do I need Wi-Fi in my bedroom?

data.question: Do I need Wi-Fi in my bedroom?
data.answer:
Yes, to get your SleepIQ® score and see your data, the SleepIQ® system needs to be connected to the internet via Wi-Fi. Bed controls may be operated via Bluetooth if Wi-Fi is not available.
View a list of tested compatible routers.

bottom.name: FAQ - How are the beds delivered?

data.question: How are the beds delivered?
data.answer: Premium Delivery & Setup. Our experienced professionals will fully assemble your new mattress and base, and show you how everything works. Learn more.

bottom.name: FAQ - Can I turn off SleepIQ technology?

data.question: Can I turn off SleepIQ technology?
data.answer: You can turn it off any time through your Sleep Number® remote, SleepIQ® app or SleepIQ® website. In the SleepIQ® app, go to Settings, Bed Settings & Troubleshooting and open the individual sleeper profile. By turning the Privacy Mode toggle to “on,” you’ll stop SleepIQ® from collecting data. From your remote, press the Home button and hold for 2 seconds. You’ll be asked if you’d like to turn off SleepIQ.® It will stay off until you turn it back on.

bottom.name: FAQ - Can I return or exchange my adjustable base?

data.question: Can I return or exchange my adjustable base?
data.answer: FlexFit™ Smart Adjustable Bases are not returnable, exchangeable, or part of the 100-Night-In-Home Trial. FlexFit™ smart adjustable bases are covered under a full one-year warranty and a limited 15-year warranty against defects by the manufacturer.

data.content: CertiPUR-US® certified foams meet rigorous standards for content, emissions and durability, and are analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories.

pdp_explore.name: Animated Tab Panel - iLE Features Tab

data.description_1: Sleep just right with temperature balancing layers and a breathable sleep surface designed for the best comfort and climate for both of you.
data.description_2: A combination of pressure-relieving and dynamic comfort layers so you feel blissfully supported.
data.description_3: Choose your ideal firmness, comfort and support — your Sleep Number® setting — on each side. Change it whenever you'd like.
data.description_4: Automatically responds to your movements throughout the night to keep you both effortlessly comfortable.
data.description_5: SleepIQ® technology lets you see how well you slept, along with personalized insights for even better sleep.
data.description_6:
Our smart sleepers get 28 minutes more restful sleep per night.‡

‡Based on average SleepIQ® data of sleepers who engaged with certain features vs. those who did not.

data.description_1: Age, gender, temperature and support preferences all affect your sleep. The Sleep Number 360® smart bed lets you adjust firmness on each side to your ideal comfort — your Sleep Number® setting. So it’s perfect for couples.
data.description_2: The Sleep Number 360® smart bed senses your movements and automatically adjusts firmness to keep you comfortable all night long.
data.description_3: The Sleep Number 360® smart bed balances temperature, absorbing excess heat and releasing it as you cool, so you both sleep comfortably.

data.title: Frequently Asked Questions
data.faqs:
[{"id":"c62bbce2-4e2a-4d4c-8530-1e998c87e80f","question":"Do I need a base?","answer":"

A Sleep Number bed requires a firm flat surface to evenly support the air chambers inside your bed. A traditional box spring does not provide the support required for a Sleep Number mattress. The firm solid surface offered by our Integrated Base, a FlexFit™ 3 Smart Adjustable Base or a platform bed is the ideal surface for your Sleep Number mattress.

"},{"id":"81d2cd73-62a5-4d97-bb3a-d69d7ffcc09e","question":"Will a Sleep Number mattress fit with my existing furniture?","answer":"

Sleep Number mattresses come in all standard industry mattress sizes and will fit into traditional frames and furniture sets. FlexFit™ 3 Smart Adjustable Bases can stand-alone or be placed inside of your freestanding bed frame.

Industry standard sizes include:

  • Twin: 38"inches x 75"inches
  • Twin Extra-Long: 38"inches x 80"inches
  • Full/Double: 54"inches x 75"inches
  • Queen: 60"inches x 80"inches
  • King: 76"inches x 80"inches
  • California King: 72"inches x 84"
"},{"id":"af842e36-731a-4aef-a083-16ac6fa5a036","question":"How do I control the bed?","answer":"

A Sleep Number bed is controlled through the remote feature in the SleepIQ® app. Using this app, you can find or adjust your Sleep Number setting, adjust the position of your FlexFit™ 3 Smart Adjustable Base* and control your accessories, including under-bed lighting and foot warming. View this video to see how you can control your Sleep Number 360® smart bed with your SleepIQ® app.

*Note: The FlexFit Adjustable Base is controlled using an attached remote included with purchase.

"},{"id":"aba4861c-7a94-4a24-91a7-fc422d7a2469","question":"What is the difference between a FlexTop King and Split King mattress?","answer":"

Our exclusive FlexTop King or FlexTop California King size mattresses will have a split just at the head so you can raise and lower the head of your bed separately, but the foot of your bed will move as one. Our Split King or Split California King size mattresses will have a split down the full center so you can raise and lower the head and foot of your bed separately on each side.

"},{"id":"86a5f4c8-97be-4171-8438-f0504d7b5db8","question":"Can I try the beds before I buy?","answer":"

Yes! We have over 600 Sleep Number stores, and you will only find a Sleep Number bed in one of our stores. Unlike other manufacturers, we do not sell our beds through other mattress retailers. One of our sleep professionals would be happy to help you find your Sleep Number setting and help you find the bed model that’s best for you.

Visit our store locator to find a store closest to you.

"},{"id":"203c3475-6e2b-459d-913d-df8cb60bc3a1","question":"Do I need Wi-Fi in my bedroom?","answer":"

Yes, to get your SleepIQ® score and see your data, the SleepIQ® system needs to be connected to the internet via Wi-Fi. Bed controls may be operated via Bluetooth compatible device, if Wi-Fi is not available. Device not included.

View a list of tested compatible routers.

"},{"id":"db7f68f0-5f94-4764-9794-07551d270fd5","question":"How are the beds delivered?","answer":"

Premium Delivery & Setup. Our experienced professionals will fully assemble your new mattress and base, and show you how everything works. Learn more.

"},{"id":"7a951299-ee58-4ed0-b850-c94931a4cda9","question":"Can I turn off SleepIQ technology?","answer":"

You can turn it off any time through your Sleep Number® remote, SleepIQ® app or SleepIQ® website. In the SleepIQ® app, go to Settings, Bed Settings & Troubleshooting and open the individual sleeper profile. By turning the Privacy Mode toggle to “on,” you’ll stop SleepIQ® from collecting data. From your remote, press the Home button and hold for 2 seconds. You’ll be asked if you’d like to turn off SleepIQ.® It will stay off until you turn it back on.

"},{"id":"ec196bac-d9b5-4b25-b780-fce48814e821","question":"Can I return or exchange my adjustable base?","answer":"

FlexFit™ adjustable bases are not returnable, exchangeable, or part of the 100-Night-In-Home Trial. FlexFit™ adjustable bases are covered under a full one-year warranty and a limited 15-year warranty against defects by the manufacturer.

"}]

data.content: CertiPUR-US® certified foams meet rigorous standards for content, emissions and durability, and are analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories.

No interest will be charged on promo purchase and equal monthly payments are required equal to initial promo purchase amount divided equally by the number of months in promo period until promo is paid in full. The equal monthly payment will be rounded to the next highest whole dollar and may be higher than the minimum payment that would be required if the purchase was a non-promotional purchase. Any monthly payments shown in connection with this promotional offer exclude taxes and delivery and should allow you to pay off the promotional purchase within the promo period if (1) you make your payments by the due date each month and (2) this is the only balance on your account during the promo period. If you have other balances on your account, this monthly payment will be added to the minimum payment applicable to those balances. Regular account terms apply to non-promotional purchases. For new accounts: Purchase APR is 29.99%. Minimum Interest Charge is $2. Existing cardholders should see their credit card agreement for their applicable terms. packaged_products.description: Designed specifically for the Sleep Number 360® smart bed to provide a firm, level surface for your mattress.
packaged_products.long_description:
Designed specifically for the Sleep Number 360® smart bed to provide a firm, level surface for your mattress.

Coordinates with the mattress and holds the Firmness Control™ system with one plug into a wall outlet. Fits within industry standard-size furniture or bed frames. No assembly required.
packaged_products.meta_description: The Sleep Number 360 Series bed. The only bed designed to make you smarter, healthier and happier. Starting around $299 for Queen size..
packaged_products.merchant_message: Modern clean lines add a premium feel to any décor.

Find the Sleep Number 360® smart bed that best meets your needs.","textType":"h3"}],"id":"d7a01391-71a0-4e4f-9206-ee48b15315b8"},{"attributes":{"margin":"16"},"parts":[{"type":"button","id":"545f2a13-8494-40df-850a-f921a2aaf81a","text":"Take our bed quiz","buttonTheme":"secondary","url":"/find-your-perfect-mattress"}],"id":"1a957ceb-c14e-4769-adfa-44161ae7c2ce"}]

data.html:
The Sleep Number® Integrated Base works with your existing bed furniture and any decor to provide a firm, level surface for your mattress.

The modern, clean lines add a premium feel to any décor. Designed specifically for the Sleep Number 360® smart bed, it coordinates with the mattress and holds the Firmness Control™ system with one plug into a wall outlet.

Fits within industry standard-size furniture or bed frames. No assembly required. 

  • Twin: 74.5" L x​ 37.5" W x 8" H, 35 lbs.
  • Twin XL: 79.5" L x 37.5" W x 8" H, 37 lbs.
  • Full/Double: 74.5" L x 52.5" W x 8" H, 42 lbs. 
  • Queen: 79.5" L x 59.5" W x 8" h, 46 lbs. Split 
  • King: 2 pieces, 79.5" L x 37.75" W x 8" H per side; 37 lbs. per side 
  • Cal King: 2 pieces, 83.5" L x 35.75" W x 8" H per side; 39 lbs. per side
Frame and legs are not included.

packaged_products.name: Integrated Base & Frame
packaged_products.description:
Designed specifically for the Sleep Number 360® smart bed to provide a firm, level surface for your mattress.
Stylish frame compatible with the Integrated Base.
packaged_products.long_description:
Designed specifically for the Sleep Number 360® smart bed to provide a firm, level surface for your mattress. Coordinates with the mattress and holds the Firmness Control™ system with one plug into a wall outlet. Fits within industry standard-size furniture or bed frames. No assembly required.

Stylish frame compatible with the Integrated Base.
packaged_products.meta_description: The platform integrated bed base and frame works perfectly with your Sleep Number 360 Smart Bed. See how you can get your best sleep with this bed base!
packaged_products.browser_title: Platform Bed Base & Frame for 360 Smart Bed

data.html:
Stylish frame compatible with the Integrated Base.

9-inches tall (when used with the Integrated Base, the base and leg/frame kit will be 17-inches)

Available sizes: Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King and California King.

Integrated Base Frame is made up of 5 pieces: Two side rails with three connections for the support beams to slide and lock into place.

No tools necessary to install.

Ships via Home Delivery.

Decorative legs are sold separately.

data.html:
The FlexFit™ 1 smart adjustable base allows you to elevate your head and is controllable from you smart phone device.

  • Raise the head of your bed to read, watch TV or sleep in ideal comfort
  • Gently raise your partner’s head to help alleviate snoring*
  • Find your way at night with underbed lighting
Available in Stone Linen fabric to match any decor. Fits standard bedroom furniture. Made in the USA with global components.

360 Standard Adjustable Legs​ included with bed. There are 7 settings on the legs that range from 13.75" to 18.25".

Adjustable legs include optional rubber caps for use with hardwood floors. Caps add 1/4" to height of the bed.

360 Standard Adjustable Legs​ included with bed. There are 7 settings on the legs that range from 13.75" to 18.25".

Adjustable legs include optional rubber caps for use with hardwood floors. Caps add 1/4" to height of the bed.

data.html:
The FlexFit™ 2 smart adjustable base allows you to elevate your head and is controllable from you smart phone device.

  • Endless positions and favorites like the feeling of zero gravity
  • Gently raise your partner’s head to help alleviate snoring*
  • Find your way at night with underbed lighting
Available in Stone Linen fabric to match any decor. Fits standard bedroom furniture. Made in the USA with global components.

360 Standard Adjustable Legs​ included with bed. There are 7 settings on the legs that range from 13.75" to 18.25".

Adjustable legs include optional rubber caps for use with hardwood floors. Caps add 1/4" to height of the bed.

Fits within industry standard-size furniture or bed frames. No assembly required.

  • Twin XL: 37" W x 79.5" L 
  • Full/Double: 52.5" W x 73.5" L 
  • Queen: 58.5" W x 79.5" L 
  • King: (Include Split & FlexTop King): 75" W x 79.5" L 
  • Cal King: (Include Split & FlexTop Cal King): 72" W x 83.5" L
Height (all sizes): 7 adjustable settings ranging from 13.75" H to 18.25" H. Weight of base: 116 lbs.

data.html:
The FlexFit™ 3 smart adjustable base allows you to elevate your head and is controllable from your smart phone device.

  • Endless head and foot positions including favorites like the feeling of zero gravity
  • Gently raise your partner’s head to help alleviate snoring*
  • Find your way at night with underbed lighting
  • Foot warming — designed to help you fall asleep faster

Available in Stone Linen fabric to match any decor. Fits standard bedroom furniture. Made in the USA with global components.

360 Standard Adjustable Legs​ included with bed. There are 7 settings on the legs that range from 13.75" to 18.25".

Adjustable legs also include optional rubber caps for use with hardwood floors. Caps add 1/4" to height of the bed.

Fits within industry standard-size furniture or bed frames. No assembly required.

  • Twin XL: 37" W x 79.5 L" 
  • Full/Double: 52.5" W x 73.5 L" 
  • Queen: 58.5" W x 79.5 L" 
  • King (Split & FlexTop King): 75" W x 79.5" L 
  • Cal King (Split & FlexTop Cal King): 72" W x 83.5" L Height (all sizes) 

Height (all sizes): 7 adjustable settings ranging from 13.75" H to 18.25" H. Weight of base: 138 lbs.

featured_reviews.headline: Love everything about this bed!
featured_reviews.body: Everything about this bed is great! It is very comfortable and we sleep so good now.

featured_reviews.headline: Best sleep ever
featured_reviews.body: I purchased my iLE one year ago and love it more each day! Now that it’s getting cold out-the foot warming feature is warming my heart and soul every night!

featured_reviews.headline: Best Mattress Ever
featured_reviews.body: We love our Sleep Number mattress and the smart technology that tracks our sleep health.  Wish we had purchased one years ago.
